HDG.BC.content: what is thoughtworthy isn’t “thinking” but what challenges thinking, what places thinking in its service, bestows rank/value on it [thinking beyond “logic” as pathos of distance?]: extend thinking toward manner in which ground includes us in its essence, come into proximity w/ what strikes us essential, become aware, listen our way to where we belong [Gelassenheit]

motif.name: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY
motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.BC.content: [Heidegger against MOP] sight/sense for closest of all proximities suppressed by power of actual, latter presumed to become measure for each respective being & Being
HDG.BC.linkedContent: [Heidegger against MOP] sight/sense for closest of all proximities suppressed by power of actual, latter presumed to become measure for each respective being & Being

HDG.WM.content: going beyond beings occurs in essence of Dasein > this going beyond is metaphysics itself—thus, metaphysics belongs to “nature of the human being” > “because the truth of metaphysics dwells in this abyssal ground [hermeneutic circle of Dasein & metaphysics] it stands in closest proximity to the constantly lurking possibility of deepest error” > [but philosophy was born?] the getting under way of metaphysics, the coming to itself of philosophy, to its explicit tasks

HDG.DL.content: “originarily familiar (anfänglich Vertraute)”: what is entrusted to our nature, becomes known last [the only thing Heidegger’s thinking pursues, proximity to meaning of Being, etc.]
HDG.DL.linkedContent: “originarily familiar (anfänglich Vertraute)”: what is entrusted to our nature, becomes known last [the only thing Heidegger’s thinking pursues, proximity to meaning of Being, etc.]

HDG.WL.content: a way (Weg): allows us to reach something (lässt gelangen) [arrival] > peculiarity (Eigentümliche) of language conceals itself > that we are allowed to listen, we belong to language, this belonging contains actual presence (eigentlich Wesende) of way to language [proximity to facticity of language] > essence of Saying will only make itself manifest (bekunden) if we attend (achten) w/ great instancy to what the foregoing Erläuterung has offered

motif.name: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE
motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.EC.content: devastation concerns our own essence in a way we’re just beginning to presage (ahnen) [proximity to presupposition]
